description: It came to you in a dream.  A way to crystalize certain elemental aspects of an object.  All you need is a runestone, and the will to investigate.
With the fundamental elements covered, it's time to see what more can be done with these crystals.

Trying to create more complex aspects seems to create unstable crystals that imedietly decay into their compound aspects.  Yet you are confident there are more aspects out there to explore.  You will have to change your approach.
